Alg-TrigExisoseis-SynthTrEx-SectEx1: %# Database File : Alg-TrigExisoseis-SynthTrEx-SectEx1\qt_endl%@ Database source: Mathematics\qt_endlΝα λυθούν οι παρακάτω εξισώσεις.\qt_endl\begin{alist}[leftmargin=3mm]\qt_endl\begin{multicols}{2}\qt_endl\item $ \hm{(2x)}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2} $\qt_endl\item $ \hm{(3x)}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} $\qt_endl\item $ \hm{(x+\pi)}=\frac{1}{2} $\qt_endl\item $ \hm{\left(2x+\frac{\pi}{3}\right)}=1 $\qt_endl\end{multicols}\qt_endl\end{alist}\qt_endl%# End of file Alg-TrigExisoseis-SynthTrEx-SectEx1
